imdb.title: Crime Stoppers Case Files: Chicago
akas: Crime Stoppers Case Files: Chicago (United States)
plot: Case Files: Chicago profiles real, recent, and unsolved homicides around the city in an attempt to find the killers and decrease violent crime in Chicago. It airs at 11pm on The CW in the greater Chicagoland area every Saturday.::Case Files Chicago
